vsParam:
Ah, [px]!
Have you synthesized the medicine yet?

With it, we surely can...
Let me help her take it...

Yeah... Huh!?
It... It's so bitter ahhhhhh!?

Awesome! She woke up! We did it!
But does the medicine really taste that bitter?

Oh, such an adorable girl. Her hair is so silky and her eyes are
so beautiful that you'll be attracted to her naturally... Gosh!

Stop staring at her!
Um, hi, we found you aswoon in the Lost Woods.

And then, we took you here.
Ah, this is the Academy!

Yeah! Right, what's your name?
Where are you from? Could you tell us?

Um, my name... Where am I from...
Um... Um...

Sorry, I don't know...
I... I don't know anything...

What... You don't know!?
You lost all your memories!?

Probably... It's tricky...
We can't even help her find her parents...

Lost... all her memories...
It once happened to [px]...

Oh? You remember nothing but your name...
Hmm, if so, you can live here.

You can take everyone here as your "family".
Luckily, there are lots of people here, so you won't feel lonely!

... Hehe, [px]!
You're my "son" from now on——

... Hehe, [px]!
You're my "daughter" from now on——

... Oh, right!
You can settle here if you have nowhere to go back to!

You'll become one of the Academy "family"!
How about that? Isn't it a great idea!?

Hehe, yeah. Great idea.
I'll talk to Headmaster Wort.

Of course, first... We need you to be okay with that.
What do you think?

Um... If all of you are okay with this...
I'd like to... live here with you.

We don't know how to call you without a name...
Um... Right, how about "Wistyria"?

Wistyria?
I think... It's some flower?

Yeah, because the color of her eyes is exactly
that of this flower... What do you think?

Wis... tyria...
Yeah, I like it very much!

Yes!
Nice to meet you all!
